screenDescription: The screen provides a notice or announcement that can be closed and includes a link to an event, as well as an option to hide it for a day.
actionDescription: Click the "닫기" button to close the notice or announcement.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to display movie information, including titles, ratings, and booking options, as well as provide links to events and additional movie listings.
actionDescription: Click the '예매' button to proceed with booking the movie.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to provide information and options for booking movie tickets.
actionDescription: Select 서울의 봄 for select one movie from the list to choose which movie the user wants to book tickets for.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to provide information and options for booking movie tickets.
actionDescription: Click on the element "서울의 봄" to move to the reservation page for booking movie tickets for the movie "서울의 봄".

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to allow the user to select a theater, providing options based on location and special features.
actionDescription: Select 경기 30 for select one theater location from the list by clicking on the corresponding item, such as "서울 19", to choose a theater in seoul with 19 available options.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to allow the user to select a theater, providing options based on location and special features.
actionDescription: Click on the element with the purpose of selecting a theater in the 경기 area with the ID of 30.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to allow the user to select a theater, providing options based on location and special features.
actionDescription: Select 남양주현대아울렛 스페이스원 for select one theater from the list by clicking on the desired theater's name, which will likely redirect the user to a page with more information about that specific theater.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to allow the user to select a theater, providing a list of options categorized by region and special theaters.
actionDescription: Click on the theater name "남양주현대아울렛 스페이스원" to select it as the preferred theater for the user.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to allow the user to select a theater location from a list of options categorized by region.
actionDescription: Click the '선택 완료' button to confirm the user's selection of a theater from the list.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to display movie showtimes and theater information for a specific movie in a specific location.
actionDescription: Select 2D1관 163석 11:00 ~13:31 143석 13:55 ~16:26 153석 16:50 ~19:21 158석 19:45 ~22:16 153석 for select one movie showtime from the list to choose the desired time slot for watching the movie at the specific theater location.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to display the available movie showtimes and theaters for booking tickets.
actionDescription: Click on the element with the purpose of selecting the movie showtime from 11:00 to 13:31 for booking tickets.

screenDescription: The purpose of the screen is to provide a login form for members and non-members to access the website or application.
actionDescription: Input leesang627 for input the user's login id into the text field with the purpose of providing the user's identification for the login process.
